title: Trash piles up in Europe as China refuses imports
text:
Trash piles up in Europe as China refuses imports 4:50pm IST - 01:18
China's environmental crackdown means that imports of foreign waste for recycling has crashed a whopping 96 percent since January. But now trash is piling up in Europe in every place from docks to building sites as the continent struggles to figure out what to do with it all. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
